function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective crisis management","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher impact on society and economies","Mitigation":"Establish clear crisis management protocols, provide training for entrepreneurs and organizations, and ensure effective communication channels","Technologies":"Crisis management software, communication platforms, remote collaboration tools","People":"Entrepreneurs, organizations, employees, public","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, business leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate adaptation and flexibility","Impact":"Inability to respond effectively to the crisis, leading to reduced resilience and prolonged impact on the built environment","Mitigation":"Promote adaptability and flexibility through education and support for innovative approaches, encourage small businesses to embrace iterative problem-solving, and facilitate access to resources","Technologies":"Educational platforms, remote collaboration tools, resource-sharing platforms","People":"Small business owners, entrepreneurs, innovative startups","Owner":"Business support organizations, educational institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Unpreparedness for the impact of COVID-19 on entrepreneurial activities","Impact":"Disruption of entrepreneurial activities, potential closure of businesses, and reduced economic activity","Mitigation":"Develop contingency plans, provide financial assistance and guidance, and facilitate access to support networks and resources","Technologies":"Financial management software, online support networks, e-learning platforms","People":"Entrepreneurs, business owners, employees","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations, financial institutions"}]}
